markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rusting Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1901)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Rusting ammunition is made using a [ore louse's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2665) saliva and, when activated, deals damage to objects or creatures primarily made of metal. The target takes [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) for a duration determined by the type of ammunition used. A creature that drops to 0 Hit Points while taking this persistent damage crumbles into fine powder; its gear remains. The ammunition's type determines the maximum amount of an object that's destroyed.

**Craft Requirements** Supply the saliva of an ore louse.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Limited"
>
Rusting Ammunition (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 3d8 persistent damage for up to 5 rounds. For an object, the ammunition destroys a 5-foot cube.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Limited"
>
Rusting Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3,600 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 4d8 persistent damage for up to 6 rounds. For an object, the ammunition destroys a 10-foot cube.
name: Rusting Ammunition
